caption.p:
Protective efficacy of chimeric virus-induced immunity against the lethal challenge by PRV epidemic strain HB1201. (A) Clinical scores, rectal temperature, and survival rate of each group piglets immunized after HB1201 lethal challenge. (B) The same as (A) except that Bartha-K61 and Bartha-gCD
HB
1201 were used for immunization. Data are presented as mean Â± SD and asterisk indicates a significant difference between Bartha-gCD
HB
1201 and Bartha-K61 in clinical scores and the rectal temperatures. * P < 0.05; ** P < 0.01; *** P < 0.001.
